name: Kuma
title: The Bear Bodyguard
subtitle: A powerful ursine warrior who combines raw strength with surprising agility
lore: A highly intelligent bear trained in martial arts, Kuma serves as a loyal bodyguard to the Mishima family. His immense strength and surprising agility make him a formidable opponent, while his ability to coordinate with allies makes him an invaluable teammate. Despite his fearsome appearance, Kuma's loyalty and protective nature make him a reliable defender of his allies.

passive.name: Loyal Friends
passive.description: Every successful ability used by Kuma marks the hit enemies. If a teammate damages the marked enemy within the next 2 seconds, the target suffers bonus magic damage of [40/75/100/175/290]. This ability can stack, increasing the damage accordingly.

Q.name: Claw Smash
Q.description: Kuma swipes in front of him with his paw, damaging all enemies in front of him for [80/110/235/400/490] and stunning them for [1.25] seconds.

W.name: Fearsome Roar
W.description: Kuma lets out a terrifying roar, causing all nearby enemies to flee away from him in fear for [1] second.

E.name: Roll
E.description: Kuma rolls in the targeted direction, knocking back all enemies in his path and stunning them for [0.75] seconds, dealing [45/100/190/275/335] damage. While rolling, Kuma gains [80%] damage reduction and becomes immune to crowd control.

R.name: Munch
R.description: Kuma grabs a nearby enemy and begins chewing them in his arms for up to [2.25] seconds. Every [0.75] seconds, Kuma deals [125/275/400] damage and heals himself for 100% of the damage dealt. This ability can be interrupted by crowd control or cleansed by the target.

1.name: Alpha Predator
1.description: Enemies hit by Claw Smash have their healing reduced by [30%] for [1.3] seconds

1.name: Echoing Roar
1.description: Your W has a bigger radius

1.name: Grizzly Charge
1.description: Roll now increases Kuma's movement speed by [50%] for [2] seconds after the roll ends

5.name: Terrifying Presence
5.description: Fearsome Roar's fear duration is increased by [0.5] seconds, and enemies affected by Fearsome Roar are also slowed by [30%] for [2] seconds after the fear ends

5.name: Reinforced Hide
5.description: While rolling, Kuma's damage reduction is increased to [90%]. After Roll ends, retain 30% damage reduction for 2s

5.name: Voracious Appetite
5.description: Kuma's passive damage restores [30%] of the damage back to himself

10.name: Savage Bites
10.description: Munch now deals an additional [10%] of the target's maximum health as bonus damage per tick

10.name: Lingering Fear
10.description: Enemies caught in Munch are slowed by [50%] for [2] seconds after the ability ends

15.name: Resounding Smash
15.description: Claw Smash now creates a shockwave that extends 200 units beyond its original range, dealing [50%] of the original damage and applying the stun for [0.75] seconds to enemies hit by the shockwave

15.name: Ferocious Resilience
15.description: If Kuma goes below [30%] HP he gains [70AD] for [10s]

15.name: Bestial Roar
15.description: Fearsome Roar reduces enemy's armor by [12%]

20.name: Rampaging Beast
20.description: Every time Kuma uses an ability, his attack speed increases by [15%] for [4] seconds, stacking up to 4 times. Additionally, Kuma gains [5%] movement speed for each stack

20.name: Unbreakable Body
20.description: When dropping to [1%] HP or below, Kuma can't die for [2s]

20.name: Predatory Instincts
20.description: Claw Smash now deals [20%] more damage and resets the cooldown to [3s] if it successfully hits 3 or more enemies

20.name: Relentless Pursuit
20.description: Roll can break all CC any time.
